body: Hello everyone, it's been a hard day and I could use some advice about anything. Compliments, corrections anything should help. Thank you guys in advance :).

title: {AMA Acceqted}

replies.body: Uh don't eat lemons alone it's really sour. WHY DID YOU GET DEMOTED :(

replies.body:
Keep your head high. Your lucky you got to be a Jr. Mod. I didn't even get accepted.
Look forward not backwards. I know being demoted sucks but just wait for the next batch ;)
Hope that helped.
